I don't listen to mainstream or pop. No insult indented. I listen to old 80s uk punk or rock, extreme drum n bass (I am a lover of squat parties, technivals and free dingey raves) but u cannot not know a few pop songs if u use social media (evn tho my insta account is blocked...! dunno why?!? NO NUDITY, NO BOGOTRY (I am feminist, bisexual and against racism, in fact apart from my late husband most of my larywnrs have been brown or black, not that it matters) , NO VIOLANCE etc... someone petty got me banned when my account was wholesome!) Anyway. I get to know tracks and sometimes even listen to a few. But this is nice. As another comment said, when a live version is better than the radio track u DID SIMETHING GOOD! coz a lot of gigs are let downs (apart from if your an obsessed fan that will faint from the shear act of being spat water on by your idol... please remember they are human and you are too  Loving and respecting a persons art is normal, being a stan isnt unless your 10). But this was gould. Good singing, beautiful people (even tho I dont care about looks) and beautiful chemistry. To me charisma and chemistry trumps over voice ability and effects.
